lines.text: if y is greater than x , swap values between x and y
lines.code: if ( y > x ) swap ( x , y ) ;

lines.text: let ans be minimum of ( absolute value of ( x - y ) and minimum of ( ( ( 10 - x ) + y ) and ( x + y ) ) )
lines.code: ans += min ( abs ( x - y ) , min ( ( ( 10 - x ) + y ) , ( x + y ) ) ) ;
